attributes.action: Allow The green party to appear on TV debates with the 3 main parties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the run up to the general election this year, It is only fair that other parties especially The Green party should be allowed to stand alongside the leaders of the three main parties in the three television debates due to be broadcast in spring.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
